mapper.select: select count(*) from (select distinct p_code, p_name, p_c_bcode, p_c_mcode, p_hit, TO_CHAR(p_date,'YYYYMMDD') p_date, p_img, p_price from product)
select count(*) from (select distinct p_code, p_name, p_c_bcode, p_c_mcode, p_hit, TO_CHAR(p_date,'YYYYMMDD') p_date, p_img, p_price from product where p_c_mcode = #{p_c_mcode})
